text: Hulaŋ 23.35 Sng 22.7, Mt 27.39-40, Mk 15.29 iamɨgali agɨlaŋ nudɨ iga iga hɨniavɨdaci manɨgali agɨlaŋ Jisasɨ dɨ abacuvavɨmi. Nɨbu hulaŋ iamɨgali ahɨliahulalɨ uavɨmi. Asɨ agaŋ nudɨ lɨbɨmɨŋavɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali ahɨliahuiahu saŋ abɨci vemi lɨci nudɨ nukeŋ ahɨliahuavɨla kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨlihua lamalama agadɨ vala mɨgam uavɨmi.
